a53909af-62f2-4ddf-b553-aedaad026c57.name: 脆弱眼部
a53909af-62f2-4ddf-b553-aedaad026c57.notes: 对手在其视线范围内对你的眼部进行攻击时只受到 -6 命中惩罚

7ce45c25-6884-4031-9a2e-330bd5fdae17.name: 硬皮
7ce45c25-6884-4031-9a2e-330bd5fdae17.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

22d33231-c4bf-45cc-b772-1638720ed028.name: 高痛阈
22d33231-c4bf-45cc-b772-1638720ed028.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

b62f6750-647a-400b-a169-fb13496070e9.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 25 倍

bf9008db-0c44-4d28-b764-17ab5d931859.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 50 倍

ff8dfab5-77f5-4606-8962-79e49e796bd0.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 100 倍

e72c55e1-12da-47f1-959a-d3e1a6c4fb84.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 200 倍

1066d59f-3ed0-49bc-a9b6-fd15d77a5eb7.name: 增强时间感
1066d59f-3ed0-49bc-a9b6-fd15d77a5eb7.notes: You immediately act in combat before those without Enhanced Time Sense; Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

a029c271-858b-483f-a73f-069cdbbcae24.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

217f52d8-617f-4d88-8591-297bf97dfcf8.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points
